author: radekkapka
content:
Kurtosis suddenty stopped producing logs ðŸ˜¦
```
[31mERRO[0m[2024-12-30T13:07:02+01:00] An error occurred receiving user service logs stream for user services 'map[159ff4893805431e8db74e6ecdb8bbcd:true]' in enclave 'silky-brook'. Error:
rpc error: code = Unknown desc = An error occurred streaming user service logs.
 --- at /home/circleci/project/engine/server/engine/server/engine_connect_server_service.go:367 (EngineConnectServerService.GetServiceLogs) ---
Caused by: No logs file paths for service '159ff4893805431e8db74e6ecdb8bbcd' in enclave '66734907b01d4600b401d50ad45c081f' were found. This means either:
                    1) No logs for this service were detected/stored.
                    2) Logs were manually removed.
 --- at /home/circleci/project/engine/server/engine/centralized_logs/client_implementations/persistent_volume/stream_logs_strategy/per_week_stream_logs_strategy.go:63 (PerWeekStreamLogsStrategy.StreamLogs) ---
```
It happened on my own Kurtosis branch that used an older commit, but even after using the canonical `ethpandaops` one I still see the same issue. Restarting the Kurtosis engine didn't help, netiher did restarting my computer...

author: radekkapka
content: The network works 100% fine, blocks are being produced etc
